entry.title: Simply perfect! Again!
entry.content:
After the iOS8 update I still believe that this is most amazing, photoshop style, photo editor for iOS out there - if you read this, don't waste your time on other apps for photo editing - this is the perfect solution - enjoy! Simple, yet beautiful design, as a photographer - this little app gives me the pleasure of taking mobile photos and enjoying it almost as I enjoy my DSLR photos. Great work!
P.S. Now it's even faster!
Raja, ekstra aplikacija, sve sto ti treba za sminka slike - a sve u par koraka. Skidajte! :))

Simply perfect! Again!

After the iOS8 update I still believe that this is most amazing, photoshop style, photo editor for iOS out there - if you read this, don't waste your time on other apps for photo editing - this is the perfect solution - enjoy! Simple, yet beautiful design, as a photographer - this little app gives me the pleasure of taking mobile photos and enjoying it almost as I enjoy my DSLR photos. Great work!

P.S. Now it's even faster!

Raja, ekstra aplikacija, sve sto ti treba za sminka slike - a sve u par koraka. Skidajte! :))
